title: Modern Love - complex view of "modern love"

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Meredith uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex view of “modern love.”

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Meredith uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex view of “modern love.”

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
